dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, families. So, is there, like, one official recipe, or does everyone just do their own thing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Recipes do vary a bit by region, but the core idea is always a very nutritious, uh, wholesome combination. Classic includes dairy, grains, and meat.

dialogue_turns.text: Oh, definitely. Traditionally, it includes kurt – that's dried fermented cheese. And some regions, you'll find mung beans, even dried apricots or noodles.
